projects.title: Medical Imaging Platform Modernization
projects.description: Led the modernization of a legacy monolithic medical imaging system into a scalable microservices architecture. Transformed radiologist workflows and improved system performance by 300%. Built with Angular frontend and .NET Core backend.

projects.title: DICOM Anonymization Tool
projects.description: Rebuilt a complex Python-based DICOM anonymization script into a clean, maintainable Angular + .NET solution. Improved processing speed by 150% and reduced maintenance overhead significantly.

projects.title: Defense Technology Backend System
projects.description: Developed robust, high-performance backend systems for classified defense technology projects. Focused on scalability, security, and reliability in mission-critical environments with strict security protocols.

projects.title: Test Automation Infrastructure
projects.description: Built and improved automation infrastructure and test suites for medical software using C#, Ranorex, and TestComplete. Implemented Page Object pattern for maintainable UI tests and reduced testing overhead.
